title: GDG DevFest Ghana 2017 Announced
brief: Its that season, where the community comes alive. This year is no different. Our Focus this year -> Breaking Grounds. Esciting and Amazing Tech is upon us.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief:
• What innovation are you working on?
  • What's new in your area of influence?
  • How different are you using old tech to make new art!

    • If you will want to share anything with us...
